full_summary:
# Temporary Help Services to Manage Divestment of Surplus Assets

## Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity**: Parks Canada
* **Contracting Authority**: Hélène Périard
* **Phone**: 873-355-3504
* **Email**: helene.periard@pc.gc.ca
* **Address**: 30 Victoria Street, Gatineau, QC, J8X 0B3, Canada

## Tender Description

Parks Canada is seeking Temporary Help Services to manage the divestment of surplus assets. This tender is open only to suppliers who have a valid Supply Arrangement (SA) holder under EN578-172870 and have been qualified in the 9.1 Materiel Management stream and categories.

The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Altis Human Resources (Ottawa) Inc.
* Cache Computer Consulting Corp.
* Excel Human Resources Inc.
* Maplesoft Consulting Inc.
* Modis Canada Inc.
* NATTIQ INC.
* NavPoint Consulting Group Inc.
* Olav Consulting Corp
* Pleiad Canada Inc.
* S.I. SYSTEMS ULC
* SoftSim Technologies Inc.
* Solutions LDC Inc.
* Transpolar Technology Corporation and The Halifax Computer Consulting Group In Joint Venture
* TRM Technologies Inc.
* Turtle Island Staffing Inc.

## Contract Requirements

* **Duration**: The proposed contract period will be from contract award to March 31, 2024.
* **Estimated Level of Effort**: The estimated level of effort for the contract will be 240 days per resource.
* **Security Requirement**: The minimum security level required is Reliability.

## Tendering Details

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* **Region of Opportunity**: World
* **Region of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)

## Tender Closing Date

The tender will close on March 17, 2023, at 14:00:00.
